Articles.Content:
Hello all! I\'m new to KSP and enjoying it immensely so far.

I have a quick question: I read here that the AV-R8 Winglet used to be stationary before v0.10.

Is it in some way possible to get a stationery version of it? I don\'t like the AV-T1 Winglet and haven\'t really checked out any non-stock parts (recommendations welcome!).

Thanks!
Here you go, a stationary version of the winglet. It\'s just a small .cfg edit that makes this possible. Place the winglet3 folder in the parts folder of your KSP install.

Thank you so much, trbinsc!

I\'ll have a look as soon as I get home.

Hahaha, excellent!

And works exactly as it says on the box. Thank you once again!
Anyone got the one with the moving flap cut into it?
I think that one of the old Silisko editions had one, It\'s not in the 2.0 version though, but I would check the 1.2 version.
